alert.note: Alert for Dimmit; Uvalde; Zavala (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 13 at 2:21AM CDT until May 13 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR NORTH CENTRAL DIMMIT, SOUTHWESTERN UVALDE AND CENTRAL ZAVALA COUNTIES... At 221 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or could begin shortly along larger creek basins. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Uvalde, Crystal City, Carrizo Springs, La Pryor, Batesville, Washer, Las Colonias, Uvalde Estates, Chula Vista-River Spur, Winter Haven, Blewett and Carrizo Hill. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
